General.Description: Waves is a custom blockchain platform designed for large-scale business and consumer use. Waves has been created to make the benefits of blockchain technology accessible to businesses and end users. The platform is launched in 2016 and is designed from the ground up to address the shortcomings of existing blockchain services. The result is a business-ready platform that emphasizes security, ease of operation (creation, delivery, exchange) and simple user experience, as well as solving long-term issues like speed and scalability.
General.Features: Some powerful features include Descentralized token exchange; Custom and fiat token creation, deletion and transfer; Asset-to-asset exchange, and Lightweight clients.
General.Technology: Waves is the first production system built on the Scorex framework. This is an extended solution: To overcome the need for a hardware required when creating a new type of transaction on the NXT Platform (required to update the network software), WAVES provides plug-ins that are not available in the core software module but instead installed as an extension on it.
